features: 🟢 【Minimalist Wide Desk Clamp Lamp】This desk light has wide-spanning 17 inches across that ensure excellent brightness and light coverage, meanwhile consuming 80% less energy than incandescent lights. the cable hidden inside makes it a sample look and no cable tangled, perfect for home office working, painting, reading, crafting etc.

🟢【Easy Operated Front Touch Buttons】the buttons are designed in front of the light bar which is easy to see when sitting and smooth to switch the light modes: 4 brightness levels and 4 color modes. It also equipped with 【30-min auto off timer】long press power button till the light flashes once, the timer activates.

🟢【Space Saving Separated C Clamp】this tall desk lamp comes with a separated C clamp allows it clamp-onto the max desk wide 1.7 inch and it takes up absolutely no desk space, the separated design allows the lamp mounted from any direction to accommodate your different lighting needs.

🟢【Highly Flexible And Stable Goose-Neck】the long goose-neck supports flexible working height up to 24.6 inches, it has strong support that holds the lamp head over the monitor steadily or bring closer to the work surface, it casts enough lighting for you to see what you’re working on clearly.

🟢【Easy on the Eyes Soft Lighting】the desk clamp lamp provides constant flicker-free diffused lighting without eye strain, and lights up your work area but not get in the way of monitors and no-glare when you're reading on a computer screen. Please feel free to contact customer service with any questions or concerns.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: KableRika Wide Desk Lamp with Clamp Minimalist Style The overhead tall desk lamp can perfectly fit over monitors but not get in the way of monitors, 17-inch wide lamp bar lights up your entire working space evenly.
Easy to Touch Front Buttons The front buttons are within reach and smooth to switch the light settings when sitting at the monitor, and no need to stand up to look for the buttons.

Easy on the Eyes desk Lights for home office Diffused Lighting, 100% Flicker-Free It delivers eye-friendly, and comfortable light that brightens up your desk space and reduces eye strain while you work, study, or read, and get the work done easily and efficiently. Flexible Working Height The highly flexible goose-neck supports the max working height up to 24.6-inch, it can hold the lamp head over the monitor steadily or bring closer to the work surface.
Previous page 30-Min Auto Off Timer Long press the power buttons till the lamp flash once to activate the 30-min auto off timer Next page 1 Flexible to Clamp-on 2 Minimalist & Tidiness 3 30-Min Timer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Juuust Tall Enough
reviews.reviewText: I have wanted a task light to illuminate my desktop in front of my monitor and keyboard. I had originally thought of installing an in-the-ceiling light fixture above my desk, but that was going to be tricky to wire and install. So when I saw the new generation of extra-tall architects lamps I decided to go that way instead.And I'm happy I did. A couple of minutes to assemble and a few more to install. Now I've got all the light I need.It was a near thing. This lamp is >just< tall enough to reach over my 27" iMac. But it does. And it spreads the light everywhere I'd like it, while not shining directly into my eyes or causing glare on my computer screen.I've set the brightness to maximum, at least for now. I'm happy with that.It didn't take me long to decide the adjustable lamp temperature/color is also a nice feature. I've set it to the blue end of the spectrum, close to daylight.It took me a moment to discover the control buttons only need to be touched. You can't actually press them. What is nice is all the controls are all front and center -- easy to see and reach.This lamp was not the cheapest, but I think the extra cost might turn out to be worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good purchase for making models
reviews.reviewText: I really like this product. It illuminates my whole desk!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the money
reviews.reviewText: This is by far the best destiny I've ever ordered anywhere. it was easy to assemble. it has multiple levels of brightness. and it spans 36 inches probably. I absolutely recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars If the buttons worked easily, it would be perfect.
reviews.reviewText: This is a clamp-on LED desk lamp. The posable neck is only bendable about halfway, the bottom half is rigid. It is a total of 26", 13" is bendable, and is enough that I can bend it back to shine on my laptop screen, which is a good angle. The buttons are on the front of the light, easily reachable. There are buttons for the light color, intensity and power on/off. The clamp will work on a thickness up to 1.7". The neck swivels at the clamp. The light itself also swivels at the top of the neck. They are a bit loose, but it is easy to reposition. At first I thought the lamp didn't work, wouldn't turn on. Actually, the buttons work better with a very light tap VS pressing harder. I set the color and brightness so I don't have to fool with those buttons, only the power. I find that works best when I place my index and middle fingers behind the light, and tap the button with my thumb. It illuminates the screen just enough to see well in a dim room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dimmable and very good height to adapt
reviews.reviewText: I use it to light my laptop's keyboard. The orginal keys came with silver background and, for me, are hard to read in poor light conditions. The lamp solved this situation

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: See the photo. I mounted this lamp behind my monitor. To combat the glare in my eyes and the screen, I made a quick lampshade using card stock and wide black tape, which I had on hand. It can probably be made better with a couple strips of black construction paper. One slot is cut to accommodate the lamp stem and on/off switch. It simply rests on the lamp without being attached. Can be easily removed to access the brightness and color controls. Because the lamp is LED, the shade never even gets warm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice bright light
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice bright light with flexibility and good clamp. Quick shipping! Would buy from them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So this is a crazy lamp. It's great when it works! At first, it was sporadic but now is working fine. There are two pieces that have to be screwed together so sometimes they come apart and the light won't turn on. Check that if you're having problems. For the money, it's nice when it's working!

The gooseneck is super long and can tower over my 24" monitors. It has amazing flexibility in terms of different lighting settings. Multiple light options, for example, a more yellow-tinted light for the nighttime to help focus or a more bright and white-ish color for greater brightness during the day. The control panel is at the top as opposed to other products with the controls on the wire underneath the table. The control panel being at the top is super convenient and accessible! Overall, nothing else can compare to it, and loving every minute of it!
Well constructed. Fits perfectly on the desk. Very durable. I like it.
La lampe récemment reçue, nous plaise , à tester dans la durée et pour toutes les fonctionnalités

Wie immer sehr schnelle Lieferung durch Amazon.Die Umverpackung enthält eine hochwertige Schaumstoffauskleidung in der die Einzelteile der Leuchte vor Beschädigungen geschützt, sicher ankommen.Mitgeliefert wird eine mehrsprachige, mit guten Skizzen versehene Bedienungsanleitung und ein nett aufgemachter, kleiner Faltbogen mit einer Kontaktadresse des Herstellers für den Fall von Defekten oder Fragen des Käufers.Der Aufbau ist durch das mitgelieferte Werkzeug (Kreuzschlitz) und vier Schrauben schnell erledigt.Wenn der stabile Sockel und der Lampenarm verbunden sind, kann der LED-Lampenbalken eingeclipst werden. Dieser wird danach mit dem Stecker verbunden, der vor dem Clipsprofil oben aus dem Lampenarm herausgeführt wird.Nun muss nur noch das Kabel vom Steckernetzteil am unteren Ende des Lampenarms angeschlossen werden – fertig-.Die Leuchte in strahlendem weiß macht einen wertigen Eindruck.Der Arm mit flexiblem Silicon-Mittelteil lässt viele Einstellungen und Neigungen zu, so dass man schnell eine gute Ausleuchtung seines Arbeitsfeldes erreicht.Alle Einstellungen werden über kleine Touch-Felder vorn am LED-Lampenbalken vorgenommen.So kann man seine Lieblingsfarbtemperatur in 6 Stufen einstellen: 3000K- 3500K- 4000K- 4500K 5000K- 6000K.Weiterhin sind die LEDs stufenlos dimmbar.Ein besonderes Feature ist die abschaltbare Überwachung der Umgebungshelligkeit, mit der die Elektronik die Helligkeit der LEDs automatisch an die Umgebung anpasst. Damit wird Strom gespart und die gewünschte Helligkeit wird z.B. auch bei unterschiedlicher Sonneneinstrahlung gehalten.Ich habe die Leuchte nun einige Tage in Betrieb, konnte meine Lieblingseinstellung rasch finden und bin sehr zufrieden mit der blendfreien Beleuchtung des Arbeitsplatzes. Nur eine USB-Lademöglichkeit wird man nicht finden und smart ist die Leuchte auch nicht. Der Mehrpreis gegenüber vielfältigen Billigangeboten ist dafür aber erlebbar.

reviews.reviewTitle: The touch feature for the buttons does not function well.
reviews.reviewText: Nice sleek light, the touch buttons don’t function well. For $70 I think it could be better.
